sections.intro: We're looking for an enthusiastic, self-motivated Senior Data Engineer to join our team and help shape the future of blockchain data infrastructure. You'll work at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and decentralized finance, building robust data systems that power insights across the crypto ecosystem.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain scalable data pipelines to collect, process, and store large volumes of blockchain and market data
Build and optimize data infrastructure using Dune Analytics and other blockchain data sources to support analytics and decision-making
Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs
Implement data validation and monitoring processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency across blockchain datasets
Develop and maintain data models, dashboards, and reports to support business analytics and strategic initiatives
Optimize data storage and retrieval processes for performance and scalability in high-volume blockchain environments
Establish and enforce data governance policies and best practices for handling sensitive financial and user data
Conduct exploratory data analysis to discover trends, patterns, and insights that drive business strategy in the crypto space
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, or related field
5+ years of experience in data engineering, data analytics, or related field
Strong proficiency in Python for data processing and pipeline development
Hands-on experience with Dune Analytics for blockchain data querying and analysis
Strong SQL skills and experience with relational databases
Experience building and maintaining production data systems at scale
Understanding of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency markets
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Strong communication and interpersonal skills for collaborative work
nice_to_haves: Experience with cloud data platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Familiarity with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark) and data warehousing solutions
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Looker, Power BI)
Previous experience in DeFi, Web3, or fintech environments
Knowledge of smart contract data structures and on-chain analytics
